description: What’s not to love about this festive wool sock? Its flat knit toe seam will give you extra comfort while its elasticized arch brace will give you a stay-put fit, and the light cushion on the bottom of the foot will help keep your feet warm and comfy. With its wintery, snowflake pattern, this sock will get you in the spirit of the season—even if it’s not the season!
name: Smartwool Everyday Snowflake Pattern Crew Socks - Mens
